recipe.title: Baked Rice, Cheese and Vegetable Casserole
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups frozen whole kernel corn, thawed
1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme or 1 teaspoon dried
instructions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium-low heat. Add onion and bell pepper and sauté until tender, about 8 minutes. Add corn and tomato and sauté 3 minutes. Add rice, 1 cup cheese, cream and thyme and stir until cheese melts and mixture is heated through. Transfer mixture to 8-cup soufflé dish.
Preheat broiler. Sprinkle remaining 1 cup cheese over rice mixture. Broil until cheese melts, about 2 minutes.
